aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.intro: We are a team of students from computing backgrounds who came together through shared passion for artificial intelligence and campus services. We are dedicated to developing intelligent applications that solve real campus challenges.
aboutUs.missionText1: Through technological innovation, we provide teachers and students with smarter, more convenient campus services. We believe technology should serve people, and campus is the ideal place for technology application.
aboutUs.missionText2: Our intelligent assistant project aims to integrate campus resources and provide one-stop services including policy queries, psychological guidance, natural language communication, and campus recommendations, making campus life more efficient and organized.

project.title: Project Introduction
project.subtitle: The Campus Intelligent Assistant is a comprehensive web application designed to enhance the intelligence level of campus life
project.featuresDesc: Our application integrates various aspects of campus learning, life, and social needs, providing comprehensive services in an intelligent manner.
coreFeaturesList: Personalized campus and surrounding area recommendations
techHighlightsList: Recommendation algorithm based on deep learning
Intelligent assistant tailored for ASEAN students
project.progressText: Version 1 has completed multilingual support and core model training, and is now in operation. Version 2 is under development for web chat rooms, WeChat mini programs, and mobile apps, with internal testing expected in the second half of the year.
